title: ‘Pachinko’ Episodes 1-3
description:
Dave Chang and David Choe convene to talk about the first three episodes of the new Apple TV show, ‘Pachinko,’ which tells the story of an immigrant Korean family across four generations.
Hosts: Dave Chang and David Choe
Producer: Sasha Ashall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
